consoleLabel.description: A mode based on NES Tet

consoleDescription.message: Die am meisten wettbewerbsbenutzte, klassische Version des Puzzles der Welt!
consoleDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.
